summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General (OIG) voluntary interview waiver form, used to inform an employee of their rights and obtain consent for questioning as part of an investigation. The specific investigation subject is redacted, but the form is part of the Epstein-related document set.
keyFacts: The document is a Department of Justice OIG form for voluntary employee interviews.
It provides warnings that statements may be used in future criminal or disciplinary proceedings.
The specific investigation topic is redacted, appearing as 'opty-l-iymnet. &dine On3 GUIs -QCAA'.
The form includes signature lines for the OIG Special Agent, the employee, and a witness.
This document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting an OIG investigation related to the matter.
